title: Elon Musk Takes a Page Out of Mark Zuckerberg’s Social Media Playbook
description: As Mr. Musk takes over Twitter, he is emulating some of the actions of Mr. Zuckerberg, who leads Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp.
dc:creator: Kate Conger, Ryan Mac and Tiffany Hsu
category: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People

media:content.media:description: Elon Musk in January 2020. As Twitter’s new owner, he met this week with civil rights groups.
